rules: Use IBM Plex Sans for all body text.
Use JetBrains Mono for data values, logs, and code snippets.
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds, use #050505.
Use 'Electric Blue' (#3B82F6) for primary actions and active states.
Use 'Neon Purple' (#8B5CF6) for AI-related elements (predictions, insights).
Use 'Signal Red' (#EF4444) ONLY for critical alerts/failures.
Glassmorphism backgrounds must use backdrop-blur-xl and a 1px white/10 border.
Every pixel must be utilized. Use h-full on children.
Use 'Tracing Beam' borders for active/critical cards.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(59,130,246,0.5)] transition-all duration-300

visual_enhancers: Tracing Beam: Animated gradient border for high-priority cards.
Glassmorphism: Used for sticky headers and overlays.
Grid Borders: Subtle border-r and border-b for data tables.
Scanlines: Optional subtle overlay for 'Terminal' sections.

animations: Fade In: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }}
Pulse: animate={{ opacity: [0.5, 1, 0.5] }} for live indicators

hero_background.alt: Abstract blue glowing digital network lines

server_room.alt: Futuristic server room with blue lights
server_room.usage: Infrastructure monitoring section, demo mode background

ai_brain.alt: Abstract purple and blue AI node graph
ai_brain.usage: Root Cause Analysis visualization, AI insights header

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1). Use APCA for fine-tuning.
accessibility.interactive: All interactive elements must have visible focus states (ring-2 ring-primary).

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures and noise overlays separate good from extraordinary.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: Install clsx and tailwind-merge if not present (already in package.json).
Use the 'Electric Swiss' archetype: Deep black backgrounds, electric blue/purple accents, precision typography.
Implement the 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard.
Use the provided image URLs for specific sections.
Ensure all charts (Recharts) use the defined palette colors.
Create a 'Layout' component that handles the sidebar/header structure with glassmorphism.
